data.title: Elfriede Jelinek – 2004 Nobel Prize for Literature
data.meta_description: Arts.21 presents the winner of the Nobel Prize for Literature, Elfriede Jelinek. Some critics were surprised by the decision to award the honor to the militant Austrian writer.
